title: IS THAT RISEN FIDDLESTICKS?!?!
body: I just bought black scourge {{champion:27}}  and where his bottle used to be is now a casket, and after further inspection on the skin around the head area it looks like the skull/body type of Risen {{champion:9}}. i myself am not up to date with all lore on most champions so if this is the case and fiddle is indeed in the casket why would this be the case? as far as i know the two have never crossed paths but on the battlefield. any insight on this skin would be helpful.

replies.body:
I don't really think so, it just looks like a wrapped up body in a casket.
The only thing somewhat similar is the weird jagged mouth shape thing that Fiddlesticks has.
I would honestly buy a skin for Swain if Fiddlesticks was riding on his back.
